description: Headsets buying for 60 federal government working days from the date of award. Bidders have 10 days from the availability of the procurement to send in their quotes through the Electronical Indiana project of Public Services and Procurement Canada. When that happens, public services will begin the evaluation phase. If everything seems satisfactory, they may then award a contract based off of the efficient bid. Since this solicitation is part of the Electronic India project, it covers the official language which allows private lenders to get their bids submitted without having to undertake expensive red tape.  This has given public services the liberty to expand their market reach to promote economic stability in the county. Lastly when you do this, don't even greet the polite people and do a direct start up by opening multiple tabs.

full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Headsets for the Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada**

**Solicitation No.: 2BH2125521A**

The Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada is issuing a solicitation for the procurement of headsets. The solicitation number is 2BH2125521A. The bid submission deadline is 14:00 AST on November 15, 2022.

**Contract Objectives**

The purpose of this solicitation is to acquire headsets for the Department of Environment and Climate Change Canada. The delivery destination is Ottawa, Ontario. The delivery period will be 60 federal working days after contract award.

**Specifications**

The specifications for the headsets are outlined in the Request for Quotation and include details on functionality, interoperability, and performance. The contractor is expected to comply with applicable federal procurement regulations and standards.

**Security Requirements**

There are no security requirements associated with this solicitation.

**Trade Agreements**

This solicitation is subject to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Regions of Opportunity**

This solicitation is open to all suppliers worldwide.

**Regions of Delivery**

The delivery destination is limited to Ottawa, Ontario, with the exception of the National Capital Region.

**Contracting Entity**

The contracting entity is Shared Services Canada. The contact information is as follows:

* Alyssa Brook, Procurement Officer
* Shared Services Canada
* 180 Kent Street, 13th Floor
* Ottawa, Ontario K1G 4A8
* Phone: 343-548-0159
* Email: alyssa.brook@ssc-spc.gc.ca

**Notice and Documents**

The solicitation documents are available on the Government of Canada's buying and selling site. Suppliers can access the documents by clicking on the following link: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login. The documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Note: The tender has expired, and the contact information has been retrieved from the text. It is not recommended to submit a tender at this point as it is past the deadline. However, for the sake of completeness, the rewritten entry is included below.
